name: LittlePeeps' Truly Baked Potato Salad
author: littlepeepsbrude
summary: This is a creamy potato salad, made with bacon and scallions, that tastes just like a baked potato with cheese on top.
ingredients: 1 cup sour cream, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes
Transfer potatoes to a bowl of ice-cold water to cool completely
Place the bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until crisp, about 10 minutes
Peel about half of the potatoes; chop peeled and unpeeled potatoes together
Stir sour cream, sharp Cheddar cheese, scallions, salt, and ground black pepper together in a large bowl; add chopped potatoes and stir to coat
